name: HelpMeGiveCompliments
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: help me give compliments
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We could all use more positivity in our lives, and that positivity has to start with someone. This skill will help you build the habit of complimenting the people in your life and starting that cycle of positivity.

Use this skill each day to get tips and tricks for building the habit of complimenting other people. It will give you ideas for compliments (both small and big), advice on how to feel less awkward when giving compliments, and some reminders about just how much a single compliment can matter to someone else.

If you'd like to see more of any of the types of advice mentioned above or you simply want more functionality in this skill, please leave a review and let us know. Compliments are always welcome too :)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
